languages.text: "Люди с верхних палуб сторонятся этих мест. Но как можно жить на флагмане и отворачиваться от его нутра, дающего жизнь?"
"Upper-deckers avoid coming here. But how can one live aboard the flagship only to turn one's back on the core that gives it life?"
languages.original_text: "Люди с верхних палуб сторонятся этих мест. Но как можно жить на флагмане и отворачиваться от его нутра, дающего жизнь?"

traits.locale_text: "Upper deckers avoid coming here. But how can one live aboard the flagship and turn their back on the core that gives it life?"
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Upper deckers avoid coming here. But how can one live aboard the flagship and turn their back on the core that gives it life?"
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Upper-deckers avoid coming here. But how can one live aboard the flagship only to turn one's back on the core that gives it life?"
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: "Oberdecker meiden es, herzukommen. Doch wie kann man an Bord des Flaggschiffs leben und dem Kern, der diesem Schiff das Leben schenkt, einfach den Rücken zurückkehren?"
languages.original_text: "Upper-deckers avoid coming here. But how can one live aboard the flagship only to turn one's back on the core that gives it life?"

traits.locale_text: "Oberdecker meiden es, herzukommen. Doch wie kann man an Bord des Flaggschiffs leben und dem Kern, der diesem Schiff das Leben schenkt, einfach den Rücken zurückkehren?"
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: « Les habitants des ponts supérieurs évitent de s'aventurer ici. Mais comment peut-on vivre à bord du vaisseau amiral en tournant le dos au cœur battant qui lui donne vie ? »
languages.original_text: "Upper-deckers avoid coming here. But how can one live aboard the flagship only to turn one's back on the core that gives it life?"

traits.locale_text: « Les habitants des ponts supérieurs évitent de s'aventurer ici. Mais comment peut-on vivre à bord du vaisseau amiral en tournant le dos au cœur battant qui lui donne vie ? »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: «La gente de las cubiertas superiores evita venir aquí. Pero ¿cómo se puede vivir en la nave insignia y dar la espalda al núcleo que le da vida?».
languages.original_text: "Upper-deckers avoid coming here. But how can one live aboard the flagship only to turn one's back on the core that gives it life?"

traits.locale_text: «La gente de las cubiertas superiores evita venir aquí. Pero ¿cómo se puede vivir en la nave insignia y dar la espalda al núcleo que le da vida?».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: 「上層部はここに来るのを避ける。でも、旗艦に命を与える核心に背を向けてまで、旗艦で生活することができるの？」
languages.original_text: "Upper-deckers avoid coming here. But how can one live aboard the flagship only to turn one's back on the core that gives it life?"

traits.locale_text: 「上層部はここに来るのを避ける。でも、旗艦に命を与える核心に背を向けてまで、旗艦で生活することができるの？」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: “上层甲板的人很少来这种地方，可既然在这艘旗舰上生活，又怎么能不去理睬赋予它生命的核心呢？”
languages.original_text: "Upper-deckers avoid coming here. But how can one live aboard the flagship only to turn one's back on the core that gives it life?"

traits.locale_text: “上层甲板的人很少来这种地方，可既然在这艘旗舰上生活，又怎么能不去理睬赋予它生命的核心呢？”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.original_text: "Upper-deckers avoid coming here. But how can one live aboard the flagship only to turn one's back on the core that gives it life?"
